          <title>
            <string language="fr">Système de Ptolemaic</string>
            <string language="en">Ptolemaic system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ptolemaic System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema de Ptolemaic</string>

          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la théorie géocentrique du modèle de Ptolémée sur les positions relatives des planètes, du soleil et de la lune.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Earth-centred theory in Ptolemy's model of the relative positions of the planets, the Sun and the Moon.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Masse-zentrierte Theorie
im Modell Ptolemäus der relativen Positionen der Planeten, der Sonne 
und des Mondes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a teoria Terra-centrada 
no modelo de Ptolemy das posições relativas dos planetas, do sol e 
da lua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la teoria 
Terra-centrata nel modello del Ptolemy delle posizioni relative dei 
pianeti, del sole e della luna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γη-κεντροθετημένη θεωρία 
στο μοντέλο Ptolemy των σχετικών θέσεων των πλανητών, του 
ήλιου και του φεγγαριού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la teoría 
Tierra-centrada en el modelo de Ptolemy de las posiciones relativas de
los planetas, del sol y de la luna.</string>
          </description>
